reviews.detail: I am always impressed with your ability to articulate problems and solutions.
I'm fascinated by the amount of impact you make in the teams that you worked on, your in depth knowledge and you[r] strive for perfection in everything you do.
You communicate so clearly and effectively, a product manager's dream! You are a natural leader.

It has been a pleasure cause you are a very competent and friendly person. Thank you for your guidance in the intricacies of [the middleware service] and for all your support to the entire client team.
Every time someone on [my] team works with you - they always compliment.
